name: electron-prisma-trpc-example
description: An example repo showing how to use Electron with tRPC and Prisma

scripts.build: vite build && prisma generate && tsc --build && node copy-files.js && node install-engines-on-mac.js
scripts.start: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron .
scripts.publish: npm run build && dotenv -- electron-builder -p always

author: Ayron Wohletz
